claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dennis Lee Hopper  (  May 17 , 1936 -- May 29 , 2010  )  was an American actor , filmmaker , photographer and artist .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He attended the Actors Studio , made his first television appearance in 1954 , and soon after appeared alongside James Dean in Rebel Without a Cause  (  1955  )  and Giant  (  1956  )  .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the next ten years he made a name in television , and by the end of the 1960s had appeared in several films .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hopper also began a prolific and acclaimed photography career in the 1960s .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hopper made his directorial film debut with Easy Rider  (  1969  )  , which he and co-star Peter Fonda wrote with Terry Southern .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film earned Hopper a Cannes Film Festival Award for `` Best First Work '' and a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay  (  shared with Fonda and Southern  )  .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Journalist Ann Hornaday wrote : `` With its portrait of counterculture heroes raising their middle fingers to the uptight middle-class hypocrisies , Easy Rider became the cinematic symbol of the 1960s , a celluloid anthem to freedom , macho bravado and anti-establishment rebellion '' .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Film critic Matthew Hays notes that , `` no other persona better signifies the lost idealism of the 1960s than that of Dennis Hopper '' .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He worked on various small projects until he found new fame for his role as the American photojournalist in Apocalypse Now  (  1979  )  .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He went on to helm his third directorial work Out of the Blue  (  1980  )  , for which he was again honored at Cannes , and appeared in Rumble Fish  (  1983  )  and The Osterman Weekend  (  1983  )  .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He saw a career resurgence in 1986 when he was widely acclaimed for his performances in Blue Velvet and Hoosiers , the latter of which saw him nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His fourth directorial outing came about through Colors  (  1988  )  , followed by an Emmy-nominated lead performance in Paris Trout  (  1991  )  .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hopper found even greater fame for portraying the villains of the films Super Mario Bros.  (  1993  )  , Speed  (  1994  )  and Waterworld  (  1995  )  .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hopper 's later work included a leading role in the short-lived television series Crash  (  2008 -- 2009  )  , inspired by the Academy Award-winning film of the same name .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Production on his final film , The Last Film Festival  (  2016  )  , completed just before his death ; originally slated for 2011 distribution , the project was picked up for theatrical release in late 2016 by Monterey Home Video .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hopper has an additional posthumous credit in the completed , but unreleased Orson Welles drama The Other Side of the Wind , acquired for distribution by Netflix .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Catchfire is a 1990 American action thriller film directed by Dennis Hopper and starring Jodie Foster , Dennis Hopper , Fred Ward and Vincent Price .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The original screenplay was written by Rachel Kronstadt Mann , then re-written by Ann Louise Bardach , who was hired by Dennis Hopper and producer Steven Reuther .

claim: Dennis Hopper had an acting career.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A total of six films starring Dennis Hopper have been selected for preservation in the National Film Registry .
